title: Cardi B flaunts her post lipo body and surgically enhanced breasts
text:
She got a breast augmentation and underwent liposuction earlier in the year.

And Cardi B flaunted her new physique on social media for her 52 million fans on Monday.

The 27-year-old stripped down to her $520 vintage Louis Vuitton swimsuit for an incredibly sultry post.

New body: Cardi B showcased her her bikini body on Monday following her liposuction surgery and breast augmentation surgeries earlier in the year

'Make me leak,' she captioned.

Cardi flashed her surgically enhanced cleavage in the low cut bikini top.

She teamed the look with a G-string style bikini bottom that allowed her toned stomach and long legs to be on show.

Busting out: Cardi flashed her surgically enhanced cleavage in the low cut bikini top

The Bodak Yellow rapper completed her look with a pair of strappy heeled sandals or the risque shot.

She accessorized with her diamond watch and new birthday ring that she received from her husband Offsett over the weekend.

Cardi recently vowed to never get any more plastic surgery, following complications of her breast augmentation and liposuction.

'I been working out for the past 2 weeks cause b*tch I ain’t getting surgery again but let me tell you I haven’t got a headache ever since,' she said at the time.

Jewels: She accessorised with her diamond watch and new birthday sparkler ring that she received from her husband Offsett over the weekend

Cardi's complications forced her to cancel a slew of planned shows.

'Look how swollen my feet get every time I take flights my stomach gets even more puffy,' she captioned the photo.

'Reasons why my doctor told me to chill on shows cause my feet and stomach burn when I get puffed up NOT due to ticket sales.Stop fakin s*** f*** outta here,' she added.

Cardi cancelled shows in May and explained on Instagram Stories that: 'My breasts gotta f***ing heal and it is what it is.'

Mama: Cardi underwent lipo abd a boob job following the birth of her daughter Kulture, one

'I hate canceling shows because I love money. I’m a money addict, and I get paid a lot of money, a lot of money for these shows.

'A lot of money. I’m canceling millions 'f dollars in shows, but like, health is wealth so I have to do what I have to do.”'

Cardi confessed to the crowd in Memphis at the time that she shouldn't have been there performing but chose to do so anyway.

'I shouldn't really be performing because moving too much is gonna f*** up my lipo. But b**** I'm still gonna get my motherf***ing money back, let's go!' she explained.

Painful experience: Cardi recently vowed to never get any more plastic surgery, following complications of her breast augmentation and liposuction

Update: Cardi admitted to having her breasts redone through cosmetic surgery after the birth of her daughter Kulture - whom she shares with Offset

Cardi admitted to having her breasts redone through cosmetic surgery after the birth of her daughter Kulture - whom she shares with Offset.

'I just got my boobs redone,' she told Entertainment Tonight in May.

'I feel good, but then sometimes I feel like not, you know? [When] your skin is stretched out.

'Yes, my daughter f**ked me up!' she joked. 'She did, she so did.'

She said in a video posted to Instagram last September that she was planning to go under the knife after Kulture 'did [her] bad.'

But now Cardi B is making plans to heal and stay healthy.
description: Cardi B showcased her her bikini body on Monday following her liposuction surgery and breast augmentation surgeries earlier in the year.
